org.michailov.async.io

Class CharsetAsyncOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.michailov.async.AsyncOptions
      • org.michailov.async.io.CharsetAsyncOptions
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineAsyncOptions

    public class CharsetAsyncOptions
extends AsyncOptions
    Options that control the execution of async char encoding and decoding.

      • DEFAULT

        public static final CharsetAsyncOptions DEFAULT
        Shared instance that represents the "default" set of options. Use this field to avoid unnecessary heap allocations.

        public java.nio.charset.Charset charset
        Charset for the encoded/decoded bytes. The default is ASCII.
